name: Wealthy
content:
Description

Whether you were born into nobility, come from old money, are heir to a great treasure, or simply a well-established merchant, you are wealthier than the average adventurer.

Effect

Your wealth score is increased by 1.

data.description: Whether you were born into nobility, come from old money, are heir to a great treasure, or simply a well-established merchant, you are wealthier than the average adventurer.
data.effect: Your wealth score is increased by 1.
